mapper.update: UPDATE MATERIAL SET wip_location = null, break_back_flg = 2, outline_time = current_timestamp WHERE material_id = #{material_id};
mapper.insert: Insert into `production_feature` (material_id,position_id,pace,rework,section_id,operator_id,operate_result,action_time,finish_time,use_seconds) select #{new_material_id},position_id,pace,rework,section_id,operator_id,operate_result,action_time,finish_time,use_seconds FROM `production_feature` WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND position_id IN (9,10,11,12);
mapper.select:
SELECT `wip_storage_code`, `shelf`, `layer`, `simple_code`, `anml_exp`
,ma.`wip_location` IS not NULL as occupied
FROM `wip_storage` ws
LEFT JOIN material ma ON ws.`wip_storage_code` = ma.`wip_location` AND ma.outline_time is null
and `wip_storage_code` = #{wip_storage_code}
and `for_agreed` in (0, 1)
and `for_agreed` in (0, -1)
and `shelf` = #{shelf}
and `kind` = #{kind}
and `anml_exp` = 1
and `anml_exp` = 0
ORDER BY `anml_exp`, `for_agreed`, `kind`, `shelf`, `layer`, `simple_code`, `wip_storage_code`
